issue.title: [CF 1134] Boss timer Tracking
issue.body:
If i track Shattering Smash CD (4) by that exact name it tracks all shattering Smashes, do i have to put the ability in quotation marks to track the exact name ?

Its a Condition Icon with Boss engaged "Blackhand" and Boss timer "Shattering Smash CD (4)" and "Shattering Smash CD (6)".


> Posted by CurseForge user Drozo_Qoocla | Imported from CurseForge issue #1134 | Raw

comments.body:
Please include the export string of the icon that you're having trouble with.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
